boardgame.name: Fesztáv
Flügelschlag
Na skrzydłach
Wingspan
boardgame.description: Wingspan is_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;nbsp;a competitive, medium-weight, card-driven, engine-building board game from Stonemaier Games._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You are bird enthusiasts_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;researchers, bird watchers, ornithologists, and collectors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;seeking to discover and attract the best birds to your network of wildlife preserves. Each bird extends a chain of powerful combinations in one of your habitats (actions). These habitats focus on several key aspects of growth:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gain food tokens via custom dice in a birdfeeder dice tower_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Lay eggs using egg miniatures in a variety of colors_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Draw from hundreds of unique bird cards and play them_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The winner is the player with the most points after 4 rounds._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you enjoy Terraforming Mars and Gizmos, we think this game will take flight at your table._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash;description from the publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: 63. DDP Sam i back on A wing and a fireball, Fireball Island and Wingspan
